function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Higher ventilation rate and open windows may lead to increased exposure to air pollution and allergens.","Impact":"Increased risk of respiratory diseases and exacerbation of existing conditions.","Mitigation":"Use air filters and purifiers to remove pollutants and allergens from incoming air. Ensure proper maintenance of ventilation systems.","Technologies":"Air filters, purifiers, ventilation system maintenance.","People":"Inhabitants of buildings with higher ventilation rates and open windows.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers."},{"Description":"Limited green space and space between buildings may lead to a higher risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of infectious disease outbreaks due to close proximity and lack of natural barriers.","Mitigation":"Increase the amount of green space in urban areas and implement urban planning policies that prioritize building spacing.","Technologies":"Vertical gardens, green roofs, urban planning technologies.","People":"Urban inhabitants and visitors.","Owner":"Urban planners, city authorities."},{"Description":"High usage of crowded public transport increases the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased likelihood of infectious disease spread among commuters and the general population.","Mitigation":"Promote alternative modes of transport such as walking and cycling, stagger commuting times, and enforce capacity limits on public transport.","Technologies":"Traffic management systems, bike-sharing programs, pedestrian-friendly infrastructure.","People":"Commuters, public transport users.","Owner":"Transport authorities, city governments."}]}
